subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Scott Boras compares his top free-agent this off-season in Matt Holliday with his top client last season, Mark Teixeira, leaving out the categories in which Teixeira has the edge.
snippet: Scott Boras compares his top free-agent this off-season in Matt Holliday with his top client last season, Mark Teixeira, leaving out the categories in which Teixeira has the edge.
